attributes.action: return the garden to the owners of 21 Cottage Close
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The garden at 21 Cottage Close has been largely removed to craete a footpath-we believe this rightfully belongs the owners of number 21 Cottage Close and should be reurned to them

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
